description: A delicious lamb and potato roast  that you can easily serve on a holiday dinner.
name: Rack Of Lamb & Potato Tray Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1000g rack of lamb, frenched and scored
650g baby potatoes, scrubbed and cut into halves

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. In a small bowl mix the olive oil, rosemary, salt, pepper and garlic. Place the baby potatoes in a large sheet pan. Add half of the olive oil mixture and mix thoroughly. Bake for 10 minutes.
While the potatoes are baking, add the lemon zest to the rest of the olive oil mixture and rub it all over the lamb rack.
Stir the potatoes and move to the sides. Roast until it reaches internal temperature of 55 degrees Celsius about 20-25 minutes, Rest for 10 minutes before serving.
